parameters.name: ImageCategory
parameters.description:
The source of the image. Valid values:

Public: public images provided by Alibaba Cloud.

Custom: the custom image that you added.

parameters.name: ImageType
parameters.description:
The type of the images. Valid values:

VM: Virtual Machine Image

Container: container image

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20.
